EntityDef.name: indicatorStatus
EntityDef.description: The current status of the special indicator.

EntityDef.name: indicatorName
EntityDef.description: The name of the special indicator.

EntityDef.name: AnrFunction
EntityDef.description: Contains parameters and constraints for Automatic Neighbor Relations (ANR) functions, such as adding or removing neighbor cells.

EntityDef.name: AnrFunctionId
EntityDef.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

EntityDef.name: plmnWhiteList
EntityDef.description: Lists all PLMN IDs that are available for handover and X2.

EntityDef.name: pmRlcSduRecUlVoipTtiBundling
EntityDef.description:
The path loss distribution of the Radio Link Control (RLC) Service Data Units (SDU), that are received for a VoIP bearer in uplink.
PDF ranges: [0]: Number of samples =< 115 dB [1]: Number of samples in range ]115..116] dB [2]: Number of samples in range ]116..117] dB ... [37]: Number of samples in range ]151..152] dB [38]: Number of samples in range ]152..153] dB [39]: Number of samples > 153 dB
EntityDef.condition: The counter is stepped when a RLC SDUs is received for a VoIP bearer of a UE that is configured for TTI Bundling.
EntityDef.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

EntityDef.name: pmCaCapableDlFddTddSum
EntityDef.description:
Downlink carrier aggregation capability reported by UEs that use this cell as their PCell. Only the maximum number of SCells, where at least one of the carriers is TDD, is considered.
PDF ranges: [0]: Number of UEs that are capable of FDD PCell plus one TDD SCell. [1]: Number of UEs that are capable of FDD PCell plus two SCells, with at least one TDD SCell. [2]: Number of UEs that are capable of FDD PCell plus three SCells, with at least one TDD SCell. [3]: Number of UEs that are capable of FDD PCell plus four SCells, with at least one TDD SCell.
EntityDef.condition: When UE capability is registered, the counter that corresponds to the maximum number of downlink SCells with at least one TDD is incremented. When UE capability is deregistered, the counter that corresponds is decremented.
EntityDef.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

EntityDef.name: maxSentCrsAssistCells
EntityDef.description: Maximum number of neighbor cells whose CRS Assistance Information is sent to UE.

EntityDef.name: Cdma2000FreqRelation
EntityDef.description:
This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a CDMA2000Frequency. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

EntityDef.name: Cdma2000FreqRelationId
EntityDef.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

EntityDef.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
EntityDef.description: Prioritizes CDMA2000 frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)
